meanings.definition: To bounce off a surface and change direction.
meanings.sent1: The ball ricochetted off the wall.
meanings.sent2: The bullet ricochetted off the metal door.
meanings.sent3: The rubber duck ricochetted off the bathtub, surprising the cat.
meanings.sent4: Her words ricochetted off his heart, leaving a lasting impact.
meanings.sent5: The idea ricochetted in his mind, sparking new possibilities.

meanings.definition: The act of bouncing off a surface and changing direction.
meanings.sent1: The ricochetted of the bullet was unexpected.
meanings.sent2: The loud noise was caused by the ricochetted of the ball.
meanings.sent3: The ricochetted of the ping pong ball amused the players.
meanings.sent4: The ricochetted of the light off the mirror created a dazzling effect.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the ricochetted echoed through the room.
